parameters.definition: Set of languages that translator i can translate

description: Select the combination of translators that ensures all required languages can be translated into, at the minimum possible cost. There are \param{N} translators, each with an associated cost of \param{Cost}. Each translator i is capable of translating a set of languages \param{Languages}. The objective is to meet the translation needs for \param{M} required languages, listed in \param{RequiredLanguages}.
